div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1527 Syria?, before 1917 Burial: c. 245 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 13+ AR Antiochus I: 12 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim as ESM 143 [1], 155 [4], 157 [3], 162 [1], 166 [1], 177 [2]) Antiochus II: 1 tetradr. 1 (Seleuceia ad Tigrim as ESM 189) Disposition: Istanbul Seen by M
